# aspect

**Instance Property**

The aspect ratio of the light’s shape.

## Declaration

```swift
var aspect: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the light’s type is [doc://com.apple.modelio/documentation/ModelIO/MDLLightType/discArea],  [doc://com.apple.modelio/documentation/ModelIO/MDLLightType/rectangularArea], or [doc://com.apple.modelio/documentation/ModelIO/MDLLightType/superElliptical], this property determines the lengths of the shape’s major and minor axes (longer and shorter dimensions) relative to the [doc://com.apple.modelio/documentation/ModelIO/MDLAreaLight/areaRadius] property’s value.

## Managing a Light’s Shape

- **areaRadius**: The radius, in units of local coordinate space, of the area from which light emanates.
- **superEllipticPower**: A vector that controls the roundness of a superelliptical light in the x- and y-axis directions.
